text: Unless required for the purpose of your contact with us, your data will only be processed internally by Qboxmail staff and will not be disclosed to third parties.
In the latter case, we will store and process your data for this purpose for 24 months.
We may also process the contact details entered in the form to send you commercial information and offers related to our services, but only if you have given us your consent.
We use cookies to provide you a better browsing experience, by continuing you accept their use.
If you use the contact form, we will process the data you provide in it to respond to your request, based on art. 6, letter. b) EU Regulation 2016/679.

You can also request that the data you have provided to Qboxmail be transferred to another data controller ("right to portability"), if the processing is based on your consent or on a contract concluded with you and is carried out by automated means.
When you browse the websites www.qboxmail.it / www.qboxmail.com / docs.qboxmail.com we may collect certain navigation data through the use of cookies or similar technologies.

data_type: personal datum relate to customer management
text: If you purchase one of our services or sign up for a free trial, we will process certain personal data related to customer management and others related to the provision of our services.
When you browse the websites www.qboxmail.it / www.qboxmail.com / docs.qboxmail.com or use a contact form, Qboxmail collects certain personal data.
